Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class MainSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.MainSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class MainSceneController extends Object implements GUIController
The MainSceneController class is responsible for controlling the main scene of the application. It implements the GUIController interface.
